mapper.select: select t.id,t.title,t.content,t.type,date_format(t.modify_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') modify_time,t.modify_user_id,u.fullname creater_name from core_news t,core_user u where t.id = #{id} and t.modify_user_id=u.id
select count(1) count from core_news t where t.is_delete=0
